bibl.author: A. J. Falls
bibl.title: A. J. Falls to J. F. Asper, 25 February 1871

revisionDesc.change: added bibliographic data with microcopy and roll numbers

body.ab: I am directed by the Attorney General to inform you that the United States Attorney for the Western District of Missouri has been requested to continue the case of The United States vs. H. B. Branch, to the next term of the court.
